Class OverlayView

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Focusable

    public class OverlayView
extends Overlay
    A Custom View overlay on MapView. They will always face the MapViewâ€™s camera, maintaining the same size and orientation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OverlayView

        public OverlayView(View myView,
                   Activity activity)
        Initialize a new OverlayView
        Parameters:
        myView - the custom Android View, must be a RelativeLayout in order for MapView to position the view correctly
        activity - the activity that created this View. Need this in order to manipulate the position on behalf of the activity

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(Coordinate position,
                        int offsetX,
                        int offsetY)
        Anchors the overlay to a certain position across all maps with an offset
        Parameters:
        position - Vector3 that has position information. (the position is the midpoint of the overlay's bottom line)
        offsetX - offset x in dp
        offsetY - offset y in dp
